entry.title: The End
entry.content: If I don’t update this, then I am dead by now.

entry.title: Best Friend
entry.content:
Hello best friend, ironic ain’t it? I called a site as best friend, but that’s what I feel. I can’t share if I am not feeling fine with my family in Indo, otherwise they will be very worried, but if I share stuff with my family here they don’t believe me.

Now what hurts most is, when you tell someone you are not feeling fine, they’d say, it’s only on your head.

I try to believe that they are right, so live my days as they go. Bye.

entry.title: It obviously comes when it's colder?
entry.content:
Yeah two days ago, it was 18-23°c here in Germany, it was spring!

But since yesterday, the temperature dropped dramatically until 5°.

I got headache again :–( Though it was gone after I took Tomapiring but it is the same headache, the same location..

Plus I felt strange in my chest, sooooo tired feeling again..

So let’s hope it’s temporary..

entry.title: Feel Sooo Tired
entry.content:
I don’t know what’s wrong with me, I feel so tired in the afternoon, after doing literally nothing.

Morning, taking my little darling to Kindergarten, go home, cleaning the house a bit not the hard tasks, pick her up again, prepare lunch, eat our lunch, clean the dishes, and now hardly can do anything because of tired feeling.

I want to check, but will they believe me? It was a Brain Tumor suspicion and now Heart disease suspicion, they’ll think I am crazy, making it up.

But no, I don’t, I feel there is something wrong with me.

entry.title: Two Days No Headache - Endings
entry.content:
Since I got two worst headache two or three days ago, I didn’t even feel something on my head in the last two days, it was a bliss.

However, today, I felt slightly terrible headache for a few seconds infront of computer.

I did neck-gym 20 times, seems to be better, but I don’t want to have this kind of headache again, please not this one..
